WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 08 FEB
   BY M/V HAI YANG SHI YOU 720 TOWING TEN
   12000 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   20-20S 038-52W, 20-30S 038-54W,
   20-26S 039-18W, 20-15S 039-15W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 229/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 09 FEB 21.
